_header: The thing that thou might leesen clepeth not thine own
_description: Four lines translating: ‘Nil tuum dixeris quod potes perderis’, etc. in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.First Lines:
þe þing þat þu mauth lesen clepet nouth þin
                    owenLift vpward þin herte heuene for to knowen…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…þat þe werd þe leuit he rolit it
                    aȝenþo þat þe werd despiset blissed sulen þei
                    ben
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 4.
